title: David Fogle, influential preservationist, dies at 94
description: At the University of Maryland, he started a historic preservation program to get students hands-on experience.

title: James Dobbins, U.S. diplomat in global hot spots, dies at 81
description: Mr. Dobbins reopened the U.S. Embassy in Kabul following the 2001 invasion. Two decades later, he bemoaned U.S. mistakes as the Taliban regained power.

title: Russian missile strike kills four civilians in Lviv, far from frontline
description: In Lviv, often viewed as a safe haven close to the border of Poland, local officials called the it the worst strike since the start of Russia's invasion in February 2022.

title: Mercenary boss returns to Russia to collect money and guns
description: Yevgeniy Pirgozhin's presence in Russia raised new questions about the murky deal that allowed him to avoid prosecution on insurgency charges following a failed rebellion.

title: Coco Lee, pop singer whose career spanned two continents, dies at 48
description: She was the voice of heroine Fa Mulan in the Mandarin version of Disney’s 1998 animated film “Mulan.”

title: Gangnam style vs. squalor: Inequality in South Korea’s most famous area
description: The Seoul suburb, home to both majestic high-rises and village shacks, is a microcosm of the widening social and economic inequality bedeviling South Korea.

title: Russia to close Finnish Consulate in St. Petersburg, expels diplomats
description: The move follows Finland’s expulsion of nine Russian diplomats on suspicion of espionage but goes a step further in closing one of the consulates of Finland. The Nordic country recently joined the NATO alliance.

title: Photos: Israelis protest after Tel Aviv police chief says he was forced out
description: Israelis blocked highways in support of the popular police chief Ami Eshed, who says he was forced to resign over his handling of anti-government protests.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Zelensky asks Biden for NATO invite; four killed in Lviv attack
description: More than 50 apartments were destroyed in a massive Russian attack on civilian infrastructure, the mayor of the western Ukrainian city said.

title: ‘Tunisia is not outside democracy,’ country’s top diplomat says
description: Tunisian Foreign Minister Nabil Ammar spoke to The Washington Post on issues ranging from attacks on migrants from sub-Saharan Africa to concerns about the state of Tunisian democracy.

title: What is happening in Jenin in the occupied West Bank, and why now?
description: Disaffected, mainly young Palestinians from refugee camps are rising up against the Israeli occupation and Western-backed Palestinian leadership.

title: David Gilmour, entrepreneur who created Fiji water, dies at 91
description: He turned pure island water into liquid gold, selling his company in 2004 for a reported $50 million.
